name: You can not escape
description:
Just a simple 'Snake' clone, origionally developed as part of an escape room project; uploaded as a learning experience for deployment.

Controls: 

  • 'Any key' on 'Main Screen' proceeds to the 'Level Screen'
  • Left and right cursor keys controlling the snake
  • Return key on 'Game Over' screen: restarts game

Change log (1.1.0.0)

  • Added control pictogram because testers kept going for bombs and where confused with controls itself
  • Framerate independent, increasing speed on food consumption
  • Score adjustment/balancing

Change log (1.1.1.0)

  • Legal files added

Change log (1.2.0.0)

  • Release version
